title: Designing new environmental policy instruments to promote the sustainable development of iron and steel production in China: A comparative analysis of cleaner production assessment indicator systems and the assessment principles of the green factory
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Resources Policy, Volume 96

Author(s): Yuanqi Jiao, Qiyun Chen, Yunhui Wu, Chuanwei Ji, Ni Zhang, Hongbin Luo, Kewei Zhang
